articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower as energy stocks weigh; domestic home sales fall - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index inched lower at open on Thursday, weighed down by energy stocks tracking weaker crude prices, while official data showed domestic home sales fell 8.4% sequentially in June.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens flat as weaker energy stocks offset mining gains - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened flat on Tuesday as losses in energy stocks on weaker crude prices offset gains in miners.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
July 20 (Reuters) - Canadas main stock index opened flat on Tuesday as losses in energy stocks on weaker crude prices offset gains in miners.

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher as commodity-related stocks shine - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Wednesday, as heavyweight energy and mining stocks tracked stronger commodities, with investors awaiting minutes from the U.S. Federal Reserve's latest meeting for clues on its policy stance.

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower as energy stocks weigh - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened lower on Tuesday, as energy stocks were dragged down by weakness in crude prices, while investors remained on the sideline ahead of the two-day U.S. Federal Reserve meeting.
